backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no implemented logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing menu-related feature requirements and associated files.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for various frontend files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles with light/dark theme OKLCH tokens and global background/foreground rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point defining metadata and loading the React app root.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component assembling all site sections with header and footer.
frontend/src/components/ContactSection.t: Contact section with location card, phone buttons, and opening hours display.
frontend/src/components/GallerySection.t: Gallery grid with modal preview supporting image enlargement and fallbacks.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Hero banner featuring cafe name, tagline, CTA buttons, and feature highlights.
frontend/src/components/MenuImagesDialog: Dialog showing a scrollable grid of menu screenshots with click-to-enlarge support.
frontend/src/components/MenuSection.tsx: Renders the menu section with accordion categories and items sourced from menuData, including images, badges, and pricing.
frontend/src/components/Section.tsx: Provides a reusable layout section with optional background styling and container wrapping.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Displays the site footer with branding, location, contact info, and a link crediting caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Implements a responsive header with scroll-based styling, smooth section navigation, and mobile menu toggling.
frontend/src/content/gallery.ts: Exports an array of gallery images with src, alt text, and optional titles for the site's gallery section.
frontend/src/content/menu.ts: Defines menu item interfaces and exports structured menu data for breakfast, Italian dishes, pizza, and other categories.
frontend/src/content/menuImages.ts: Provides a list of menu image assets with alt text for use in the menu image viewer.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an authentication context using Internet Identity, handling login, identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Exports an empty hook placeholder since the static site requires no backend queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind layers and defines extensive OKLCH-based light/dark theme variables plus font imports and base element styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping App with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors from CSS variables, extended theme options, plugins, and animations.
project_state.json: Describes the project state and requirements for building a singleâ€‘page cafe website with strict content and design constraints.
